string_table.name: pxabnsnfns10111001101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="If you’re viewing this presentation, you’ve probably just received an accommodation memo from one of your students. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="You may be asking yourself, what does this mean? What are my roles and responsibilities in supporting this student’s accommodation? Who can I contact with my questions? 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="This presentation will answer all of these questions and more. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="If you’d like to jump straight to information about a specific accommodation, click on a title in the menu on the left. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="If you’d like to know more about the entire accommodation memo, click NEXT at the bottom right of the screen to continue. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="On the right of this screen, you can see a sample accommodation memo from Disability Support Services here at HCC. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="You can click on the form to zoom in. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="The accommodation memo contains the student’s name, the counselor’s name and phone extension, and the required accommodations.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="In the additional accommodations section, you may see additional comments or instructions about the accommodations the student requires. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="If you have any questions or concerns regarding the accommodations on a students’ accommodation memo, contact Disability Support Services at 443-518-1300. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click NEXT to continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Although there are many different accommodations students with disabilities may require, there are two main types of accommodations: classroom accommodations and testing accommodations. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click on the each of the accommodations to learn more.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="When you’re finished, click the Continue button at the bottom right of the screen. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="What if you teach online? 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Instructors teaching online are required to follow the same behaviors as instructors teaching face-to-face classes in regards to accommodations.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Students taking online classes may provide a memo via email or give it to the instructor in person. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="For additional assistance with accommodations for online students, contact DSS at 443-518-1300 or e-Learning at elearning@howardcc.edu 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click NEXT to continue." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Your dedication and willingness to support students who need accommodations helps make this campus a more inclusive and welcoming place for all students. Thank You!
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="If you suspect that a student in your class could benefit from an accommodation, contact Disability Support Services. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Please see the contact information below to contact the appropriate office for additional support with accommodation memos.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Click NEXT to exit this course." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Click on this image of the Accommodation Memo to zoom in, and get a closer look at the memo itself." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Click on this image of the Accommodation Memo to zoom in, and get a closer look at the memo itself." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Disability Support Services can provide additional information and support for you and your students who have documented disabilities." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Contact the Test Center to send exams for your students to take or find out more information about testing services." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Contact AV to reserve instructional equipment or to find out more about AV design services." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Instructional designers and media specialists in the Center for Teaching Excellence can assist faculty with lesson design, alternative teaching and technology strategies and accomodation resources such as captioning for videos." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
